definition: case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)

sentences.english: The shell of ZZG50A vacuum filter is a heavy welding structuce.
sentences.chinese: ZZG50A真空过滤机机壳为大型铆焊件。

sentences.english: The induction airflow dispersion plate is arranged under the machine shell and comprises a faceplate and a frame.
sentences.chinese: 诱导式气流扩散板配置于机壳的下方。

sentences.english: Equipped with galvanized case, and equipped with the stainless steel resistance inside.
sentences.chinese: 镀锌钢板机壳，内置不锈钢电热丝。

sentences.english: In the casing surface spray treatment, stainless steel box cover.
sentences.chinese: 机壳表面喷塑处理，不锈钢箱盖。

sentences.english: The paper gives out structure of tilting pin type hydraulic forging die for producing frame of shaker.
sentences.chinese: 给出了震动器机壳斜销式液锻模具设计结构。

sentences.english: Periodically measure insulation resistance, inspect motor sheath grounding.
sentences.chinese: 定期测量绝缘电阻，检查机壳接地情况。

sentences.english: Alternatively, he said, they could use one of many available cases.
sentences.chinese: 同时，他还说，用户可以选用市售的多种机壳。

sentences.english: In practice, the turbine disc and the nozzles are fitted into a casing.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，涡轮圆盘和喷嘴是装在机壳里的。

sentences.english: The turbine rotor is supported in the bearing housings and is radially independent from the outer casing.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮转子通过轴承座的支撑径向独立于外机壳。

sentences.english: Shell decoration and anti static plastic material.
The principal axis is installed at the machine shell center of the duster by use of the ball bearing.
sentences.chinese: 主轴以滚珠轴承安装在喷粉机的机壳中心。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
